summary: A local sheriff is unjustly accused of murder in a small town and forced to flee. He gets rid of his enemies one by one and tries to prove his innocence.
cast: Giuliano Gemma|Germán Cobos|Teresa Gimpera|Serge Marquand|Daniele Vargas|Gia Sandri|Nello Pazzafini|Benito Stefanelli|Carlo Hintermann|Furio Meniconi|Tullio Altamura|Riccardo Pizzuti|Rossella Or|Marco Bogliani|Franco Balducci|Pietro Capanna|Giovanni Ivan Scratuglia|Fortunato Arena|Bruno Ariè|Simón Arriaga|Omero Capanna|Angelo Casadei|Giuseppe Castellano|Nestore Cavaricci|Enrico Chiappafreddo|Domenico Cianfriglia|Spartaco Conversi|Lucio De Santis|Arnaldo Dell'Acqua|Alberigo Donadeo|Andrea Fantasia|Alba Maiolini|Aldo Marianecci|Gino Marturano|Romano Milani|Attilio Pelegatti|Osiride Pevarello|Carlo Pisacane|Umberto Raho|Umberto Salomone|Alfred Thomas|Pietro Tordi|Clemente Ukmar|Nino Vingelli
keywords: woman with a gun|manhunt|italo western|sheriff|opening action scene
director: Director: Giorgio Ferroni (as Calvin Jackson Padget)
title: Wanted (No soy un asesino)
